text: Institut supérieur de gestion, commonly named ISG, is a European higher studies establishment. L'ISG renforce ses partenariats The school is in three places, in Paris (France), in New-York (USA) and in Tokyo (Japan). ISG delivers Bachelor's degree, Master's degree and MBA.ISG Paris ISG is specialist in the fields of economics, social sciences and management.L’ISG, l’école de management ouverte à l’international Since the 10th of April 2012, the school is member of the Conférence des Grandes Écoles.Nouveau membre de la CGE ==References== Category:Universities in Paris Category:1967 establishments in France Category:Colleges and universities in New York (state) Category:Colleges and universities in Tokyo
title: ISG Business School
